data.message: Fuck you punk. If it wasn't for the fans you just told to fuck off you would be nothing! It's one thing to dislike Trump but completely different to bite the hands that feed you.

replies.message: Sure thing bitch :)

Pretty sure most of the so called fans who just fucked off probably just listened to his music for free via radio and got their bleeding vaginas hurt because he doesn't share the same political views as 20something entitled enlightened America..know this man pers9belly tired of you twat waffles coming on here with your man hating vag eating. Bullshit
Personally..excuse me..'MERICA

For one, your comment is completely asinine. For 2, I'm not mad that he has a different political view, but fucking livid he would say fuck you to fans who support the president. That's a slap in the face seeing as how I purchased every album, spent good money to see him live etc. I'm not entitled in the slightest just pissed that i was slapped in the face like that. I don't eat vag nor do I hate men lol your uneducated petty remarks make you look like an idiot. But as you say, 'MERICA HAHAHAHAHA
Speaking of Narsissists!
Hahaaa you don't matter anymore lol
Trump sucks eminem is going to bury trump in a music video so suck on it bitch

Lmfao most eminem fans hate trump cause they're not idiots he's not losing anybody worth while plus u probably only listen to white rappers cause your racist lol deal with it move on go suck trumps dick bitch hahahahaha
It's funny how these guys have opinions once they're millionaires and don't need the money from their fans anymore
Exactly Sean Lacroix
Trump nuthuggers are the only ones crying.
Ok sheeple! Keep herding like the ignorant weak individuals you are.

Josie Harris
Eminem will still have many fans. It's not because they're sheep, it's because they are fans. I guess you could call everyone, including yourself, a sheep in that regard. Eminem is entitled to his opinion, as are you and all the others that are pissed. But he will not hurt as far as his livelihood. Plus, he really doesn't owe anyone anything. Be a fan or don't be a fan. We live with our own choices and frankly I believe Eminem fully understood he would lose a lot of Trump supporters. I just don't think he cared. Like it or not.
He owes his fans everything as his fans are what made him.

Well, I disagree. He doesn't owe his fans "everything". He struggled to get where he is. He's an artist. He gained fans because of his talent and the fact that he connected with people through his music. That changes over time and his fan base may change with it, obviously. He's apparently chosen to let his fans know that he doesn't respect Trump supporters. I'm thinking since he doesn't respect them, he also doesn't owe them anything either.
I disagree but your entitled to your opinion
Hey! Koch, To hell with your mad fucking comments on Eminem... Yeah! #BurnInHell_Dude
We all have opinions, he's entitled to his and you're entitled to your own, so if you don't disagree simply don't listen to him rather than complain and go on a rant
Cry more snowflake. And fuck you for pretending to be M fan you fuckface 🖕
Jadon Chacon... contradiction.... M&M went on a rant about the Pres.
